thread.title: Facebook briefly blocks phrase 'everyone will know'
thread.title_full: Facebook briefly blocks phrase 'everyone will know'

title: Facebook briefly blocks phrase 'everyone will know'
text:
Facebook briefly blocks phrase 'everyone will know' Site says glitch was fixed Published On: 25 m Updated 23 m Tweet Nicholas Backus 
It's not as bad as a complete site outage, but it is a bit creepier, especially this close to Halloween. 
Reports of Facebook users not being able to post the phrase "everyone will know" surfaced last Friday and continued into the weekend until the social media site claimed it fixed the glitch, according to a Huffington Post report. 
Some users also reported receiving an error message saying that they had attempted to like a post, even though they claimed they were simply writing "everyone will know." Quick Clicks
